topics.body:
Ahh crap. . .
So apparently my ex boss turned out to be a jerk.

Short version is my ex boss, and currently my mom's boss, who at first seemed super cool it a massive bigot.  It's really ironic that he's that bigoted and uses slurs considering that he's gay.  You would think growing up in Louisiana in the 40's would have taught him why bigotry is wrong and all, but nope he calls african americans the n word and such and he outright hates all people under 40 cause younger generations aren't as prejudice.  What's worse is that it's undoing the support my mom had for me.

"He called me trailor trash"
"He's just a asshole"
"I'm not trying to make you upset, but are gay people like that?"
"No; he's just a asshole"
"I haven't met many gay people and I don't understand it.  How can someone like that be so hateful?"
"He grew up during 1940's Louisiana when they still hung any interracial couples by nooses."
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
